full_output.summary: As a highly motivated and detail- oriented software engineering student, I possess a strong foundation in computer science principles and programming languages. With a solid academic background and hands-on experience in various software development projects, I am equipped with the skills to design, implement, and maintain innovative software solutions

certifications.title: Divide and Conquer, Sorting and Searching, and Randomized Algorithms

projects.name: Online Banking System
projects.description: Implemented core functionalities like: Account creation and management (deposit, withdrawal, balance inquiry) Secure user authentication and authorization Database interaction :JDBC User interface: [Java Swing], [JavaFX]

projects.name: E-Commerce website
projects.description: Developed a full-featured e-commerce platform using React for a responsive and user-friendly front-end. Implemented Node.js and Express.js to build a scalable and efficient back-end API for product management, user authentication, shopping cart functionality. Utilized MongoDB with Mongoose for flexible data modeling and efficient product data storage and retrieval.

projects.name: ID card generator
projects.description: Developed an ID card generator using JavaScript. Dynamic generation of ID cards with user-provided information - name, photo, ID number. Established a user authentication system to restrict access to ID card generation and potentially manage user data.
